text: We're at the climax of some random adventure. Rick and Mo are being chased by terrifying demonic versions of Beth, Summer, and Jerry. Summer and Jerry tackle Rick, as Morty gets cornered by a his demonic mom. Rick shouts from the ground.
Morty! Do it! Hit the button now!!! Morty hesitates.
I can’t do it, Rick! They’re my parents and sister!

Morty, I already told you, it’s not your family! They’re clones from an alternate reality, possessed by demonic alien spirits from another dimension’s future! Do you need a mnemonic device or something? Just hit the button, already! The Beth demon turns normal for a moment
Morty, please, I love you, sweetheart.

Oh geez... Morty closes his eyes and hits a button on the wall of th space station. A hatch opens up in the floor, and sucks t demonic versions of Beth and Summer into it (like the Gho Busters trap), ripping their flesh off first in a disgust display. It’s horrifying. Rick gets up, dusts himself off and pulls a cartridge out of the floor. Rick shoots a por against the wall, and walks into:
Morty follows Rick into the garage. Rick is holding some of smoking sci-fi device.
Good work, Morty. These demonic alien spirits are really valuable. Morty pukes in the corner.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 2.
You okay, Morty? I told you not to trust that tuna.
I just killed my family! I don’t care what they were. Rick is casually tinkering with something.
Some people pay top dollar for that kind of breakthrough, Morty.
You know what, Rick?! That’s it! I’m done with these insane adventures! That was really traumatizing! I quit! I’m out! Morty heads to the door. Rick stops him.
Whoa, whoa! Come on, Morty, don’t be like that. The universe is a crazy, chaotic place.
No, Rick! You’re the one that’s crazy and chaotic! I don’t even understand what- what we even accomplished. Adventures are supposed to be simple and fun.
Is that what you think? Well why don’t you show me then.
What are you talking about, Rick?
You lead the next adventure. It’1l be all yours. I’1l be your sidekick.
Really? I get to call the shots?
Yeah. But let’s make it interesting. (MORE )
If your adventure sucks, you lose the right to complain about all future adventures. Plus, you have to do my laundry for a month.
Alright! But if my adventure’s good, you have to let me be in charge of every third adventure!
Every tenth.
Fine. Deal. Well let’s go. Now.
You’re on, LeBron. Beth comes in.
Dad, the dishwasher’s doing that thing again.
Washing dishes?
No. The opposite. Can you fix it? Summer comes in.
Grandpa Rick, can you help me with my science homework?
Yeah, don’t do it.
Grandpa -- Jerry comes in.
Hey, Rick. You got some kind of hand-shaped device that can open this mayonnaise jar?
Wow. Hat trick. Okay, Morty, let’s put a pin in this, I gotta help your pathetic family.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 4. Morty starts flapping his arms and dancing around.
Bawk. Bawk. Bawk.

Oh, Morty. Now you done did it. It’s on. I can’t wait to watch your adventure lay a fart. (to the family) As for you ding dongs... Rick rifles around in a box on his shelf. He pulls out a small ORNATE METAL BOX.

This is a Meeseeks Box. Let me show you how it works. You press this -- Rick presses a big button on the top of the box. Poof! An adorable, anthropomorphic little blue creature appears (l “Pit Pat” from Mr. Show.)
I’m Mr. Meeseeks!
You make a request -- (to Meeseeks ) Mr. Meeseeks, open Jerry's stupid mayonnaise jar.
Yesiree! The Meeseeks takes Jerry’s jar and starts trying to open
The Meeseeks fulfills the request - The Meseeks opens the jar and hands it to Jerry.
All done!
Wow!
Then it stops existing. Poof! The Meeseeks disappears in a cloud of smoke. Rick h the Meeseeks box to Jerry.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 5.
Oh my God, he exploded!
Trust me, they’re fine with it. Knock yourself out. Just keep your requests simple. They’re not gods. Morty starts shoving the three of them out of the garage.
Alright! Get lost! Everybody out! Move it or lose it! I have a bet to win over here!
The Meeseeks Box sits on a coffee table. Jerry, Beth, and Summer stare at it.
So many possibilities...
My mind is racing.
If we’re going to use this thing, which I’m not even sure we should, we need to keep it sim- Summer slams the button. Poof! A Meeseeks appears.
I’m Mister Meseeks!
I want to be popular at school!
Alrighty!
Summer, what did I- Beth hits the button. Poof. Another Meeseeks appears.
I’m Mister Meseeks!
I want to be a more complete woman!
“THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 6.
Beth!
Yes, ma’‘am! Summer and Beth’s Meeseeks lead them away.
You guys are doing it wrong! Jerry thinks for a moment. He waggles his fingers, does a little flourish, and pushes the button with style and confidence. Poof. A Meeseeks appears.
I’m Mr. Meeseeks!
Mr. Meseeks, I would like to take two strokes off my golf game.
Can do! Jerry leans back on the couch and smiles.
Nailed it.
Rick and Morty walk through a classic old timey RPG medie village. Morty holds a weathered cloth map, reading it as they walk.
Geez, Morty. What a boring start to an adventure. We could have just gone to Kentucky.
Rick, this is a fantasy type world with creatures and all kinds of fantasy things. We’re going on a quest. We just need to find someone who needs help with something.
Can’t wait.
Umm...
“THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 7. Morty looks around at various PEASANTS milling about. He up on a crate.
Excuse me! Is anyone in need of aid?! We are two heroes in search of adventure! The villagers all turn and look at Rick and Morty.
Oh my god, so embarrassing. A peasant rushes over to them.

At last! Two heroes! You must help us! This village is terribly poor, yet the giant that lives in the clouds above has untold treasures! We would be able to eat for years if you could get even one of the golden eggs laid by his goose.
I accept your call to adventure, good sir! Morty jumps down off the crate.
Come on, Rick. There are giants in the clouds! Morty marches proudly off. Rick follows him.
Beginner's luck.
Summer’s Meeseeks is at a podium giving a speech to the entire school.

In conclusion, a friendship with Summer Smith is a key to the most valuable and enriching experience of your young lives. I’m Mister Meseeks! Thank you! The crowd gives a standing ovation. Summer’s classmates surround her as Principal Vagina approaches her Meeseeks.
“THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 8.

Mr. Meeseeks was it? Gene Vagina. Listen, I’m in a bit of custody thing with my ex and was wondering - Poof! The Meeseeks disappears. PRINCIPAL VAGINA (CONT’D) (looks around) It’s okay, I‘’1l get your info from Summer!
Beth and her Meeseeks are sharing a bottle of WHITE WINE European-style restaurant patio.

I got pregnant at seventeen. I still put myself through veterinary school. Yes, I’m successful, but what if I hadn’t-- I’m just saying, somewhere along the way, I lost that wide eyed girl from Muskegon.
She’s still in there.

Well her waistline isn’t. Beth laughs awkwardly at her own joke. The Meeseeks grabs hand. BETH’S MESEEKS Beth. Having a family doesn’t mean you stop being an individual. You know the best thing you can do for people that depend on you? Be honest with them. Even if it means setting them free. A tear wells up in Beth’s eye.

I can’t believe I’m finally having this conversation. Beth locks eyes with the Meeseeks. She closes her eyes an leans forward for a kiss, but the Meeseeks disappears bef her lips reach it. Beth immediately looks embarrassed. A WAITRESS comes over.
“THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 9.
More wine?
(clears her throat) I think I’ve had enough.
Jerry hacks away at a ball. His swing is clumsy and hopel His grip is limp. His Meeseeks watches, dressed as a litt caddy, the Meeseeks box sits next to him.
Remember to square your shoulders, Jerry.
Yup. Got it. Jerry swings and takes out a big chunk of turf. The ball rolls off the tee.
That's okay. I’m Mister Meseeks! Try again and keep your head down.
Which is it? Square my shoulders or keep my head down?
Well, it’s both. But most importantly you need to relax. A pair of GOLFERS pull up in a CART.
Hey, buddy, mind if we play through?
Just give me a second, I’ve almost got this.
Try again. Head down. Square shoulders. Jerry tries again and whiffs it.
“THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 10.
You gotta keep your eye on the ball! Jerry throws his club down and gets in the guy’s face.
Oh, I’m sorry, are you a Meeseeks?!
(confused) I don’t know what that is... The Meeseeks is very uncomfortable with the tension.
Hey, Jerry, it- it’s cool. Let’s all get back to enjoying this beautiful day on the links. Jerry backs off.
You know what, Mr. Meeseeks? I don’t think this is working. I give up.
I’m sorry, Jerry, but it doesn’t work like that. I’m Mister Meseeks. I have to fulfill my purpose so I can go away.
Well make yourself comfortable, because I suck.
No, Jerry, I- I’m the one who sucks. Let me try something. Jerry's Meeseeks hits the button. A second Meseeks pops o
I’m Mr. Meeseeks!
Hi, Mr. Meeseeks! I’m Mr. Meeseeks!
Hi!  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 11.
Hi! Can you help me get two strokes off Jerry's golf swing?
I surely can! I’m Mister Meeseeks! The other golfer drives by in his cart.
Oh, that’s a Meeseeks.
Now what have you covered already, catch me up. Is he keeping his shoulders squared?
He’s trying! INT. GIANT’S CASTLE - KITCHEN - DAY Rick and Morty jump off a bean stalk, through a window, a onto a kitchen counter.
Alright, Morty. We’re in the giant’s castle. What next?
Relax Rick. We just gotta find the treasure room. Nice and simple. I’m sorry everything’s going so smoothly and adventurously. Looks like you're going to lose the bet. Booming footsteps are heard.
Uh oh, Morty. It’s gettin’ hairy. What should we do, boss?
Hurry. Behind this cookie jar! Morty leads Rick behind a GIANT COOKIE JAR. An ANGRY GIAN enters the room.

It’s only a matter of time before he sniffs us out Morty. Ground bones, baked bread... Just say the word and I‘’1l take us back home.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 12. Rick pulls out his portal gun.
No way, Rick. This is all part of it. Adventures have conflict. Deal with it. A HUGE GIANT comes into the kitchen.
Fee! Fi! Fo! Fum! I smell the blood of- Whoop! In one quick beat, the giant slips, hits his head on the counter, and lands on the floor, bleeding out. The giant moans in pain and suffering.
Oh my God, Rick! Oh geez, oh boy!
Yikes. He’s messed up pretty bad, Morty. Should we bail?
No, uh, wait! Just give me a sec! The Giant’s legs twitch. Morty is freaking out. A GIANT W enters the kitchen carrying a GIANT CRYING BABY.
Jesus! Dale!
Oh no, Rick. What do we do?
I’m just gonna put this out there: run? The GIANT WOMAN sees Rick and Morty.

You sons of bitches! A GIANT GLASS slams down around them. The Giant Wife glar back at the them through the glass. She pulls out a GIANT CELL PHONE and dials 911. GIANT WOMAN (CONT’D) Hello. 911. My husband has been attacked by little people! He’s dying!  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 13. Morty waves his arms from behind the glass.
No! It was an accident! We didn’t do it! Rick rolls his eyes at Morty.
Amateur.
Beth and Summer come in the door with shopping bags on th arms and frozen coffee drinks in hand. Beth is sporting a hair style.
Like, letting go of the need to be popular is what makes people like you.
The most important love you can receive is from yourself. They cross into the kitchen, not paying attention to Jerr who is currently surrounded by six more Meeseeks working improve his swing.
Okay, Jerry, just choke up on the club.
Well, which is it, choke up or follow-through?!
Aww, come on, Jerry, we've been over this, you know you need to do both.
This is as frustrating for us as is it is for you.
Don’t tell me THAT! That just puts pressure on me!
Try to relax.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 14.
You “try to relax!” Have you ever tried to relax?! It’s a paradox!
Jerry enters the kitchen, exhausted, but playing it cool. casually opens the refrigerator and pulls out a beer.
These Meeseeks, huh? Kind of a handful. I can’t imagine what you two must be going through.
Our Meeseeks have been gone for hours, Jerry.
You're kidding me.
(re: her hair) Nope. Notice anything different? Jerry blows right by it. Beth is crushed.
I’m sorry. Hours?
Dad, mom is a beautiful woman! Look at her! You will lose her!
Uhh... A Meeseeks pops his head in.
Hey, Jerry, you mind if we get back to the task at hand? Meseeks don’t usually have to exist this long, it’s getting weird for us.

-Rick and Morty stand in a police line up between FOUR GIANTS.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 15. On the other side of the glass, the GIANT WIFE points the out to the police. ALT: Criminal mice are lined up next t Rick and Morty. -Rick and Morty are fingerprinted. Morty’s entire body is mashed down into the black ink sponge. -Rick and Morty are having their mug shots taken. Behind are hash tags designating their height as FOUR INCHES. We pull back to see a giant cop lying on his stomach to take their photos. -Rick and Morty are strip searched. A pair of confused gi try to decide between a pair of TWEEZERS and a TOOTHPICK perform their cavity search. -Rick and Morty are hosed off with a squirt gun. -A giant police woman finishes sewing a pair of ORANGE JU SUITS for Rick and Morty.
TWO GIANT COPS aggressively interrogate Rick and Morty.
So you break into the victims home with the intent to steal one of his golden eggs, and what, he just happened to slip and break his neck?
Y- yeah. That’s what happened.

Hey, Mike, go easy on them. They’re so small. (to Morty) Look kid, I get it. This is a magical fantasy world filled with treasure and strange creatures. I saw that guy’s goose. Giant cops don’t make that much. If I were you, maybe I would’ve done the same.
But that’s not how it went down! A GIANT LAWYER bursts in.
“THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 16.

Fee! Fi! Fo! Fum! I smell the blood of two innocent clients! No more questions officers. (to Rick and Morty) Hello there, I’m Hugh Mungus, I’1l be representing you, and before you ask, yes, that is a humorous name in our world as well.
Rick and Morty sit in a giant-sized courtroom. A GIANT JU goes over notes as OTHER GIANTS shuffle about, a GIANT PROSECUTOR and GIANT DEFENDER prepare.

Come on Morty. This trial could drag out for weeks and I don’t think I need to tell you how it’s gonna end. Look at that jury. Morty looks at the jury of scowling giants. Rick pulls ou the portal gun.
Time to let go of your pride and call this thing.
No way Rick! We’re innocent. I have faith in the giant legal system.
Boy, you really want to win this bet, don’t you? The GAVEL bangs on the bench.

Order in the court! Before we begin the trial of tiny people versus the giant state, I just want to say that your behavior disgusts me and if it were my choice to make, I would sentence you to fee to fi years in prison right now--
Your honor. (holds up blue envelope) Motion to dismiss. The Giant Judge is very put off.
I beg your pardon. Bring that here. The Defender hands a note to the BAILIFF who takes it to judge. He reads it for a moment.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 18.
It appears these men were never read their giant rights. I have no choice but to dismiss this case. You are free fi to fo home. Everyone is puzzled.
Okay, I stretched on that one. You're free to go.
Rick and Morty exit the court, free men.
See, Rick. I was right! Everything turned out fine. Now let’s get back to it.
Get back to it? What are you talking about?
Getting treasure for the village. Come on. They approach the edge of the giant courthouse stairs.
Whoa. Usually, walking down the courthouse steps is the easy part of the adventure. The steps appear to be endless. Rick pulls out his portal again.
Morty, for God’s sake, cut your losses.

Oh yeah, you’d love that wouldn’t you? Well, no way, buddy. I didn’t come this far to let stairs get in my way. The bet is still on. Now help me out, sidekick. Morty starts angling to get down the first step.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 19.
Alright, whatever you say, Morty.
Jerry is still trying to figure out his swing. Many Meese are now trying to help him.
Everybody shut up! Let me try! (swings)
Beth appears with her coat and purse.
I’m going out. NOTE: the Meeseeks spend this conversation “ping-ponging” their gazes back and forth between Beth and Jerry.
Wait, what?
Well, you’re busy, I’m hungry, I thought I’d go out. Do you want me to be happy or do you want me to be in prison?
Whoa whoa, where in the hell-- I want you to be happy, Beth. I’11l take you to dinner. The Meeseeks collectively groan.
(to Meeseeks ) Hey, you know what? It’s hard being me TOO. (to Beth) I‘ll be right there. Beth shrugs and heads out.
Look, I’ve got a marriage to keep together, because apparently, her head got filled with ideas by a Mister Meeseeks. Maybe you've heard of him? So. (MORE )
At this point, my golf swing is more your problem than mine. Figure it out amongst yourselves. Jerry leaves and slams the front door. A SUFFERING MEESEE drops to his knees.
I can’t take it anymore. I just want to die!

Never has a problem proven so unsolvable by the Meeseeks! The leader of one of the factions stands up, let’s call h FOLLOW THROUGH MEESEEKS. These Meeseek’s voices are more serious and intense. The whole thing takes on a “Game of Thrones" vibe.

It’s become clear, that if we concentrate all our efforts on Jerry's follow through, we will solve this problem. Another alpha Meeseeks steps forward on the opposite side Let’s call him CHOKE UP MEESEEKS.

The only thing that is clear, is that choking up is the one true solution. I’m Mister Meeseeks! Jerry's original Meeseeks stands up. He now has stubble a bags under his eyes. He looks much older than the rest.
I've been trying to help Jerry for two days, an eternity in Meeseeks time, and nothing has worked. I fear the worst.

Your failures are your own, old man. I’m Mister Meeseeks! I say follow through! Who’s with me?! Half the Meeseeks cheer. A GOLF BALL hits Follow Through the head. He collapses to the ground. The Choke Up Meesee jumps on him. They wrestle around until Follow Through pi him down. He raises a golf ball over his head, about to b it down on Choke Up’s head like a large rock.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 21. FOLLOW THROUGH MEESEEKS (CONT’D) (gritted teeth) Always... follow... through. Before he can bring it down, Choke Up reaches back and hi the button on the Meeseeks Box. A new Meeseeks appears.
I’m Mr. Meeseeks!

Kill him! The New Meeseeks hisses and leaps on Follow Through. The other Meeseeks go nuts. Both sides scramble to summon mor Meeseeeks to join their side. Meeseeks appear one after another and join the fight. It’s an all out Meeseeks braw We slowly push into the horrified face of Jerry's Meeseek he watches the violence.

Stopppp!!!! The battle stops. The other Meeseeks turn to him. He clim on top of the couch. JERRY'S MEESEEKS (CONT’D) My brothers, nothing will be accomplished by shedding Meeseek’s blood. The task was to solve Jerry's problem by taking two strokes off his game. But there’s nothing that says we can’t take ALL the strokes off his game. The Meeseeks murmur amongst each other.
By killing him. The Meeseeks unite in the solution.
Rick and Morty hang from the side of a large step, rock climbing their way down. Morty has his shirt off, it’s in pocket. Rick is sweating.
Yeah, this is the part of the adventure everyone loves. Scaling down the six hundred fifty thousand oversized steps.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 22.
If this were a story, this part wouldn’t be included, dummy. Morty notices a sign located on the side of the stairs ju below. It reads “The Thirsty Step.”
Holy crap look! It’s like some kind of tavern or something! Built right into the side of the stairs!

It’s a rambunctious dive bar with all sorts of various, crazy, alien looking CREATURES. A table full of STAIR GOB (people in the shape of stairs) stop drinking and look at Rick and Morty as they walk in.
Smells like trouble.
Smells like adventure.
Well, then adventure smells like bleach and armpits. They sit at an empty table. Rick notices the stair goblin looking angrily at him.
Why you dogging me, fool?
Easy, Rick. The bartender, ROSIE, walk over.
Pay them no mind. Those stair goblins can be moody. Welcome to the Thirsty Step. The one sixteenth mark down the stairs.
Ugh, one sixteenth?  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 23.
What can I get’cha? We’ve got Skarlog Poppies, Flurlow, Halzingers, Bloogies, Juicy Times babies...
Yeah, yeah, how about some scotch whiskey? Do you have any of that around here? Or just the nonsense words?
Don't be rude, Rick. (to Rosie) We'll have two Bloogies.
You got it, sweetie.
Hey, Rosie, is there anyway to get a ride down these stairs? A crazy worm-like character, SLIPPERY STAIR, in the booth next to them turns around.
You all need a ride down the stairs? My name is Slippery Stair. I’1ll take you down there for twenty five shmeckels.
Twenty five shmeckels? Is that a lot? A little? Is it something gross that’s gonna hurt us?
That’s exactly how much I spent on my big fake boobies. A man in a business suit slides into frame.
I’m Mr. Booby Buyer! I’1l buy those boobies for twenty-five schmeckles.
It’s a tempting offer, but I’m gonna have to decline.
Rats! What a shame!  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 24. Mr. Booby Buyer scurries up the wall onto the ceiling.
(chuckles ) Alright, Rick, I’1l be right back. I gotta go to the bathroom. Morty gets up and heads to the bathroom. He turns back ar as he walks away.
You gotta give me credit for one thing, Rick, my adventures are full of some pretty delightful characters...

Morty walks into the bathroom. He stands in front of the mirror and takes a breath. He’s feeling good. He looks proudly at himself in the mirror. One of the stall doors behind Morty creeks open. A Mr. JE BEAN comes out. He is a friendly, robust character.
Well, hello there!
Hey, how’s it going?
You seem like a happy fellah!
Yeah, you know what? I am.
Well that’s just great! I like your energy. Mr. Jelly Bean moves closer to Morty.
Oh, yeah, thanks! I, uh, like yours too.

I wonder what would happen if we were to, I don’t know, mix our energies together?  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 25. Jelly Bean puts his hands on Morty’s shoulders, and start sensually massaging. Morty tenses up. MR. JELLY BEAN (CONT’D) Oh, you feel really nice.
Oh, um, no thanks! Morty tries to pull away, but Mr. Jelly Bean is very stro He loses his jolly demeanor, and firms his grip. He leans close, whispering in Morty’s ear.
Stop fighting me. Just let this happen. The more you fight, the more it will hurt. Morty struggles.
Get off me! No! Help!
Rick is singing karaoke, he’s belting out an upbeat count style song. It’s loud. The crowd loves it.
(singing) Like a Rhinestone Cowboy!
The struggle has escalated. The Jelly Bean has forced Mor into a stall.
No! No! Stop! Please!

Stop being such a fucking tease, you sweet little twat. Morty loses it. He hits Jelly Bean in the face knocking h back but Jelly Bean comes right back, tackling Morty. “Rhinestone Cowboy” continues playing as Morty somehow ge the upper hand, screaming viciously as he slams Jelly Bea head onto the toilet. He slams the seat down repeatedly u Jelly Bean loses consciousness. Morty stops and looks at hands. They’ve covered in jelly bean insides. Morty is ou breath.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 26.
Jerry and Beth eat a nice dinner.
Maybe it’s time I take that trip I always talk about.
Where would you go?
(shrugs ) Italy. Greece. Argentina. Jerry holds the wine list to his forehead like Johnny Carson’s Carnak character
(bad impression) Countries known for their sexually aggressive men. Beth doesn’t laugh. Jerry puts the list down.
Did I tell you how much I love your new hair cut? A rumbling sound is heard, like a cattle stampede. The silverware on the table rattles.
What the heck? An army of Meeseeks smash through the plate glass window pour into the restaurant.
There he is! The wave of Meeseeks surround Beth and Jerry. They look angry.
Guys. Come on. I’m trying to have a nice dinner with my wife.
Jerry. I don’t think they’re here for a golf lesson.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 27.
Well it better be damn important then. A knife flies through the air, pinning Jerry’s tie to the table.
Run, Jerry! Beth grabs Jerry by the hand and they retreat into the kitchen.
Jerry and Beth run past CONFUSED COOKS with the Meeseeks pursuit. They go into the walk in freezer and slam the do
Come on out, Jerry!
Guys, I- I’m sorry for being so difficult. I'11 choke up. I’1l follow through. I’1l do whatever you tell me to, okay?
The Meeseeks are all gathered outside the freezer.
Oh, we’re well past that, Jerry... Jerry's Meeseeks reveals a gun.
Rick is sitting playing poker with several creatures, one whom is Slipper Stair. Morty wearily approaches.
Morty! Hey! I’m sorry I was giving you so much crap. This adventure’s pretty awesome after all.
Let’s just go. I- I’m calling it. The adventure is over.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 28.
Come on, Rick, quit stalling, whattaya got? Rick turns his cards over. Everybody groans. He wins.
Sorry, fellas! Rick pulls his pile of winnings in.
We can’t leave now, Morty. I’m on fire!
(tearing up) Look, I want to leave now. You win the bet alright? Just give me the portal gun and let’s go, please. Morty reaches for Rick’s portal gun, Rick pulls back, concerned.
(comforting) Hey, hey, buddy, what’s wrong? What just happened? You were so gung ho about the bet earlier...
(sniffling) I don’t want to talk about it. Rick eyes the bathroom door. He sees Mr. Jelly Bean limpi out, wiping jelly blood off his lip.
Please, Rick, I just want to go home.

(knowingly, eyes still on jelly bean) Okay. Listen, Morty. (turns to Morty) I just won a bunch of Shmeckles. Why don’t we use 25 of them to pay Slippery Stair here for a ride back to the village, and then give the rest of them to the villagers? Huh? Morty wipes the tears from his eyes.  RAM 104 "THE MEESEEKS BOX" NETWORK DRAFT (2/15/13) 29.
Really?
Sure, Morty. A good adventure needs a good ending.
Rick and Morty climb into the Slippery Stair saddle.
Buckle up! Slippery Stair starts going down the stairs. Morty seems little less sad.
Jerry's Meeseeks paces back and forth in front of the freezer. Other Meeseeks hold TERRIFIED HOSTAGES.
